parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name of the image repository.

parameters.name: ExtraParam
parameters.description:
The additional parameter of the image repository. This parameter is required when you set the RegistryType parameter to **quay**. Valid values:

*   **namespace**
*   **authToken**

parameters.name: NetType
parameters.description:
The network type. Valid values:

*   **1**: Internet
*   **2**: virtual private cloud (VPC)

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password that is used to log on to the image repository.

parameters.name: ProtocolType
parameters.description:
The type of the protocol. Valid values:

*   **1**: HTTP
*   **2**: HTTPS

parameters.name: RegistryHostIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the image repository.

parameters.name: RegistryRegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [ListImageRegistryRegion](~~ListImageRegistryRegion~~) operation to query the IDs of supported regions.

parameters.name: RegistryType
parameters.description:
The type of the private image repository. Valid values:

*   **harbor**
*   **quay**

parameters.name: RegistryVersion
parameters.description:
The version of the image repository. Valid values:

*   **V1**
*   **V2**

parameters.name: TransPerHour
parameters.description: The number of images that are scanned per hour.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The username that is used to log on to the image repository.
